title: Dark Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['475ml (16 fl oz) boiling water', '75g (3oz) cocoa', '350g (12 oz) plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '225g (8oz) butter, softened', '450g (1 lb) caster sugar', '4 eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
